title: Looking For Team (Flex and Tourneys)
body:
I am currently looking for a team for flex queue and tournaments, I am constantly on league, I am currently Gold 1 and climbing quite steadily, I believe that I am quite a reasonably skilled player (I'm probably not), but if you would like me on your team either as a player, please send an add to Julez, I will be on all the time.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
